Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.count

Class MutableCount

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.count.MutableCount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Countable, Clearable, Zeroable, LongValued, Comparable<Countable>
public class MutableCount extends Object implements Countable, Clearable, LongValued, Comparable<Countable>
A mutable count value useful in lambdas and inner classes. Can be increment()ed, decrement()ed, added to with plus(long) and plus(long) and converted to different types with asCount() and asLong().
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
